definition: buried and at rest (idiom); Resquiescat in pacem (RIP)
to enter/to go into/to join/to become a member of/to confirm or agree with/abbr. for 入聲|入声[ru4 sheng1]
earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
variant of 為|为[wei4], because of/for/to
variant of 為|为[wei2]/as (i.e. in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do
as (in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do/by (in the passive voice)
content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere

sentences.english: Love is the tomb of marriage, but grave is better than BaoShi street.
sentences.chinese: 爱情是婚姻的坟墓，但入土为安总比暴尸街头好。
昨天，我丈夫入土为安了。

sentences.english: The three victims from the Newark school shootings have been buried.
sentences.chinese: 三名纽沃克校园枪击案的受害者昨天入土为安了。

definition: to put dead body in coffin
to bury husband and wife together/joint interment
to keep watch beside a coffin
a falling leaf returns to the roots (idiom); everything has its ancestral home/In old age, an expatriate longs to return home.
